Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 12 hours ago, Admiral Fluffy said:
> 
> 
> Does this still work? Or is it abandoned?
> 

\*Should\* still work... its just a parts mod. Might need updated Tweascale support, since \*that\* mod has gone thru different hands and lots of changes since \*this\* mod was first made..

It did still work.

Good news! This works in 1.12.2!
I think I'll download this to give all my trucks and cranes real enclosed cabs. Hopefully it works for me!
